unit.name: Marneus Calgar
unit.description: Marneus Augustus Calgar is the current Chapter Master of the Ultramarines Space Marines Chapter and the Lord of Macragge, capital world of the Realm of Ultramar in the Eastern Fringes of the galaxy.

option.name: Armour of Antilochus
option.description: Terminator armour that doesn't prevent sweeping advances and has Teleport homer

unit.name: Chapter Master
unit.description: The Chapter Masters of the Space Marines are warriors without peer, standing resolute when others would waver, advancing without trepidation when other men flee and wisely withdrawing when only a fool would futilely fight on when the odds are stacked against them.

option.name: The Shield Eternal
option.description: Grants 3+ invulnurable save and Eternal Warrior special rule

option.name: Power weapon
option.description: S: User, AP3, Melee OR S:+1, AP2, Melee, Unwieldly

option.name: Power fist
option.description: S: *2, AP2, Melee, Unwieldly, Specialist weapon

option.name: Thunder Hammer
option.description: S: *2, AP2, Melee, Unwieldly, Specialist weapon, Concussive

unit.name: Librarian
unit.description: Librarians are the psykers of the Space Marines who survive an Adeptus Astartes Chapter's rigorous screening and training to bend the powers of the Warp to their will for the benefit of their fellow Battle-Brothers and in service to the Emperor of Mankind.

unit.name: Tactical Squad
unit.description: A Tactical Marine is a Space Marine who is equipped to fight using a variety of ranged weapons across a broad range of combat conditions and is part of a ten-Marine unit called a Tactical Squad.

option.name: Plasagun
option.description: Range: 24, S7, AP2, Rapid Fire, Gets hot

option.name: Grav-gun
option.description: Range: 18, S*, AP2, Salvo 2/3, Concussive, Graviton

option.name: Plasagun
option.description: Range: 24, S7, AP2, Rapid Fire, Gets hot

option.name: Grav-gun
option.description: Range: 18, S*, AP2, Salvo 2/3, Concussive, Graviton

option.name: Missile launcher
option.description: Range: 48, S8, AP3, Heavy 1 OR Range: 48, S4, AP6, Heavy 1, Blast

unit.name: Scout Squad
unit.description: Scout Marines are the newest recruits in a Space Marine Chapter. Their duties are to infiltrate the enemy positions or to fight as lightly armed skirmishers ahead of the rest of the Chapter.

option.name: Missile launcher
option.description: Range: 48, S8, AP3, Heavy 1 OR Range: 48, S4, AP6, Heavy 1, Blast

unit.name: Rhino
unit.description: The Rhino, also known as the Mars Pattern Rhino, is an Imperial Armoured Personnel Carrier (APC) that is widely used throughout the galaxy by many different factions.

unit.name: Drop Pod
unit.description: Drop Pods are atmospheric assault transports that are primarily used by the Adeptus Astartes and their Chaos Space Marine counterparts for orbital insertion and planetary assaults where achieving tactical surprise is often an important factor.

unit.name: Dreadnought
unit.description: A Dreadnought is a cybernetic combat walker of intermediate size used by the Chapters of the Adeptus Astartes as heavy infantry support for their Space Marine companies.

option.name: Twin-linked Heavy flamer
option.description: Range: Template, S5, AP4, Heavy1, Twin-linked

option.name: Missile launcher
option.description: Range: 48, S8, AP3, Heavy 1 OR Range: 48, S4, AP6, Heavy 1, Blast

unit.name: Bike Squad
unit.description: A Space Marine Bike Squad carries out fast-moving assault missions using 8 one-man Assault Bikes and sometimes with the addition of a single two-man Attack Bike, often operating on intelligence gathered by infiltrating Scout Squads or Land Speeder reconnaissance flights.

option.name: Plasagun
option.description: Range: 24, S7, AP2, Rapid Fire, Gets hot

option.name: Grav-gun
option.description: Range: 18, S*, AP2, Salvo 2/3, Concussive, Graviton

unit.name: Predator
unit.description: The Predator is the main battle tank employed by the Space Marines of the Imperium of Man and the Traitor Legions of the Chaos Space Marines.

option.name: Heavy bolter sponsons
option.description: 2 sponson mounted heavy bolters: Range: 36, S5, AP4, Heavy3

option.name: Lascannon sponsons
option.description: 2 sponson mounted lasscannons: Range: 48, S9, AP2, Heavy 1
